titles.title: Twenty Second Sunday in Ordinary Time - Year C Psalms

properties.verseOrder: c1 v1 c1 v2 c1 v3 c1

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
In your goodness, O God,
you provided for the poor.

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
The just shall rejoice
at the presence of God;
they shall exult
with glad rejoicing.
O sing to God;
make music to his name.
The Lord is his name.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Father of orphans,
defender of widows;
such is God in his holy place.
God gives the desolate,
a home to dwell in;
he leads the prisoners
forth into prosperity.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
You poured down, O God,
a generous rain;
when your people languished,
you restored their inheritance.
It was there that your flock
began to dwell.
In your goodness, O God,
you provided for the poor.
